remarks: Elementhood in the set of finitely supported functions from ` B ` to ` A ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-May-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 28-Jun-2019.)
statement:
cantnfs.s $e |- S = dom ( A CNF B ) $.
cantnfs.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. On ) $.
cantnfs.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. On ) $.
cantnfs $p |- ( ph -> ( F e. S <-> ( F : B --> A /\ F finSupp (/) ) ) ) $.
